pages.title: Nether Gauntlet
pages.text: Level: <level_t2>$(br2)Spawns in the $(copy:Gauntlet Arena)Gauntlet Arena$()[$(copy:bosses_of_mass_destruction:gauntlet_arena)bosses_of_mass_destruction:gauntlet_arena$()].$(br)Locate this structure in the $(bold)Nether$() with $(mage/spell#locate)Spell Locate$().$(br2)Break the $(key)Ancient Carved Blackstone$() in the center of the arena to summon the $(key)Nether Gauntlet$().
